name: Hidden Objects - Romantic Love - Castle - Scary Mystery Ghost - The Secret Forest
name_original: Hidden Objects - Romantic Love - Castle - Scary Mystery Ghost - The Secret Forest
description:
This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing hidden items with beautiful scenes.

4 in 1 Pack:
- The Castle Hidden Objects
- Romantic Love Hidden Objects
- Scary Mystery Ghost Hidden Objects
- Secret Forest Ghost Hidden Objects

Features
- Beautiful high-quality images
- Addictive Hidden Object gameplay
- Catchy sound effects and music!
- Differences randomized on each play
- 3 modes of hints if you get stuck
- Try to score the Highest score!
- No ADS!
